attributes.action: Force the FA to remove Roy Hodgson from his post as England Manager.
attributes.additional_details:
Evidence: 
-Euro 2012
-2014 World Cup
-Any England game ever
-Euro 2016
attributes.background: Roy Hodgson has driven the England team into the ground, and should not be allowed to continue embarrassing us in this way. He must be removed from post immediately after England's inevitable exit from yet another tournament.
